TextView.android:text: Are you short of archers or u need a wizard?? Love COC?? Just grab your phone and ATTACK....
PRIZE(SINGLES & CLANS): TO BE DECLARED AFTER ROUND 1

General Rules: -
This is a tournament of single players, so you can join alone with your base.
You need to play friendly challenge against your opponent.
You can’t scout(view) opponent village.
With a countdown of 3..2..1..go players challenge each other.
If a player sees the enemies base he is disqualified.
Judges will watch both attacks in same time.
Clash will be held on th8 vs th8 and th9 vs th9.
Winning Rules: -
1. 1st winner decided by stars.
2. If both players end up having equal stars, then we decide as per your attack completion
time.
3. If completion time is also equal it is a draw, a new match will be started amongst them.
4. If you have 2 draws, the winner is decided by a coin toss.
Prizes:
1. Winners and runner up both TH8 and TH9 will be get gems
2. Entry fees 50/- each player.
3. Re-Entries will be open till 12:00 Noon on Day 2 of Techtrix.
NB:
For singles tournament, only “Town Hall 8” and “Town Hall 9” matches will be conducted
Don’t get any troops with you

1. Friendly challenge from 1 to another clan. 
 2. Security reasons co-ordinators of the game will be present in your clan during the war. 
 3. If clan request is declined before the scheduled war time then opponent clan will get a walkover. 
 4. If any member during the war tries to take a snapshot then the clan will be banned from our tournament. 
 5. Participated clan must open your friendly challenge option. 
 6. Now u can choose your favorite members who want to play this tournament and keep correctly time for preparation day and battle day. 
 7. If you play tornament then must stop ur clan’s global war.(don’t search any type of war). 
 8. Atleast one person must be attend in our college. 
 9. Challenge must be send ‘1hr’-preparation day and ‘2hr’-battle day. 
 Requirements : 
**Town hall 9(3pcs) ,town hall 8(5pcs),town hall 7(2pcs)[battle with 10 vs 10]. 
**each clan entry fees 200/-(Re-entry same) 
**winners clan and runners clan will be get ‘PRIZE MONEY’ !
Note : Rules are Subject to Change if Circumstances Demands
REGISTRATION FEE:(Singles) ₹50 per person, (Clans) ₹300 per team of 10 or less
